name: SOS Saturn
overview: SOS Saturn is an action adventure game. The game takes place in the year 2122 on the international research station on the planet Saturn, took over by the alien forces. The only hope for rescue is getting through the ranks of the enemy to broadcast the help signal from the main computer transmitter. The aim is to find appropriate objects scattered in the underground of the planet and use them in the appropriate places, necessary to accomplish the mission. The player has an unlimited ammo. The contact with the enemies or spikes means an instant death. The player can carry a total of five items. The biggest problem is the numerous unnecessary items that can't be put down.
